name: sfpwowerscripts-createdeltapackage-task
description: This task is used to create an delta package between two commits and bundle the created delta as as a deployable artifact,This task is part of SFPowerscripts, Please ensure Install SFDX Task is used before utilizing this task
helpMarkDown: Read more about the tasks here at
author: dxatscale@accenture.com
instanceNameFormat: Create Delta Package based on two commits

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the package in case of multiple packages,Skip if only if package is available

inputs.name: version_name
inputs.label: The name of the version that needs to be associated with the diff package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a meaningful name such as the default value, so this artifact can be identified in the release

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: revision_from
inputs.label: Revision ID (Git Commit ID) from where the diff should baselined on
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the full SHA Commit ID, from where the diff should start generating

inputs.name: revision_to
inputs.label: Revision ID (Git Commit ID) from where the diff should baselined upto
inputs.helpMarkDown: If not set, the head commit ID of the current branch is used

inputs.name: generate_destructivemanifest
inputs.label: Generate Destructive Manifest based on the diff
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this option to generate a destructive manifest to be deployed

inputs.name: set_build_name
inputs.label: Set the pipeline's build number to the the version name mentioned in the task
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set the pipeline's build number to the the version name mentioned in the task

inputs.name: bypass_directories
inputs.label: [Experimental] Exclude these directories while generating a diff
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore a comma seperated list of directories that need to be ignored while a diff is generated

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_delta_package_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to the directory where the delta package is created
